Soft Play

Our Vibrant soft play area has multi-colored slides,ball pit,tunnels and many more. The structures are designed to ensure safety while providing endless fun for children. Every corner is surrounded by the cheerful ambiance, ensuring a safe and hygienic environment for all children. We also have age appropriate soft toys, low level slides and enganging space for younger children. Come and explore,play and discover the joy of childhood

Events and Cafe

Whether you're planning a birthday party, a family outing, or just a day of fun, Kids Fun Zone is the perfect place to create unforgettable memories. Parents and guardians can relax and enjoy a variety of delicious snacks and beverages at our on-site cafeteria while keeping an eye on their little ones. Free Wi-Fi is available so you can stay connected while enjoying your time.
